AT.name: Mein Bauernhof 3D
AT.description: Das lustige Landleben ruft! Ernte Obst und Gemüse, produziere und verkaufe deine eigenen Lebensmittel und pflege viele süße Bauernhoftiere. - Kümmere dich um Kühe, Schafe, Esel, Schweine, Fische, Bienen, Hühner, Enten und Gänse - Erlebe Minispiele wie auf einem echten Bauernhof: Bestelle die Felder mit dem Traktor, ernte Obst und Gemüse, gehe angeln oder sammle die Erzeugnisse deiner Tiere wie Eier, Honig, Milch und Schafswolle - Leite deinen eigenen Hoﬂ aden und verkaufe allerhand Selbstgemachtes: Lerne über 100 Rezepte und stelle Apfelkuchen, Brot, Käse und vieles mehr her - Lenke deinen Traktor mithilfe der tollen Nintendo 3DS™ Kipp- und Bewegungssteuerung über die Felder - Sammle Spielmünzen und tausche sie in Spielwährung um - Unterstützt die Steuerung mit dem Schiebepad - 3D-Foto-Feature: Mache ein echtes 3D-Foto von dir und verwende es im Spiel!

BG.name: My Life on a Farm 3D
BG.description: Your life on a farm – live it now in fantastic 3D! Life on a farm is a lot of fun, as there always is something exciting to do: Care for your animals, cultivate your fields with the tractor or sell self-made products in your own farmshop. - Care for cows, sheep, donkeys, truffle pigs, fish, bees, chickens, ducks and geese - Enjoy loads of real farm activities in funny minigames: cultivate fields, harvest vegetables and fruit, collect wood, eggs, truffles and honey, milk the cows, shear the sheep and much more - Manage your own farm shop: Learn over 100 recipes and produce apple pie, bread, cheese and more for selling - Drive the tractor by tilting your Nintendo 3DS™ using the amazing gyroscope controls - Supports Circle Pad controls of your Nintendo 3DS™ - 3D photo feature: Take a real 3D photo of yourself and use it in the game - Collect Play Coins and exchange them for in-game currency

BE.name: Ma vie de fermière 3D
BE.description: Ta vie à la ferme : maintenant en 3D ! Vivre sur une ferme est très amusant, car il y a toujours quelque chose de passionnant à faire ! Prends soin de tes animaux, cultive tes champs à l'aide du tracteur ou vends des produits faits maison dans ta propre boutique. - Occupe-toi des vaches, moutons, ânes, cochons à truffes, mais aussi des poissons, poules, canards et oies. - Découvre tout un tas de véritables activités de la ferme dans des mini-jeux divertissants : cultive tes champs, récolte des fruits et légumes, collecte du bois, des œufs, des truffes et du miel, trais les vaches, tonds les moutons et bien plus encore. - Gère ta propre boutique : apprends plus de 100 recettes, produis des tartes aux pommes, du pain, du fromage et bien d'autres choses, puis vends-les. - Conduis le tracteur en inclinant ta Nintendo 3DS™ à l'aide des incroyables commandes gyroscopiques. - Photo 3D : prends une photo de toi en 3D et utilise-la dans le jeu. - Prise en charge des commandes des pads circulaires de ta Nintendo 3DS™. - Collecte des pièces de jeu et échange-les contre de l’argent dans le jeu.

ES.name: My Life on a Farm 3D
ES.description: Tu vida en la granja – ¡Vive ahora una fantástica experiencia en 3D! La vida en la granja es muy divertida, ya que siempre hay tareas emocionantes que realizar: Cuida de tus animales, cultiva tus campos con el tractor o vende los productos de elaboración propia en la tienda de tu granja. - Cuida de vacas, ovejas, burros, cerdos, peces, abejas, gallinas, patos y ocas - Disfruta al máximo de las actividades reales de la granja a través de divertidos minijuegos: cultivar los campos, cosechar verduras y frutas, recoger madera, huevos, trufas y miel, ordeñar las vacas y esquilar las ovejas, entre otras muchas actividades - Gestiona tu propia tienda en la granja: Aprende más de 100 recetas y produce tartas de manzana, pan, queso y otros alimentos para su venta - Conduce el tractor inclinando tu Nintendo 3DS™ gracias al increíble sensor giroscópico - Compatible con controles de mando circular de tu Nintendo 3DS™. - Función de fotos en 3D: hazte una foto en 3D y utilízala en el juego. - Consigue monedas de juego y cámbialas por monedas en el juego.

HU.name: My Life on a Farm 3D

IT.name: La mia vita in fattoria 3D
IT.description: Vita in fattoria: provala subito in un entusiasmante 3D! La vita in fattoria è molto divertente, perché c'è sempre qualcosa di emozionante da fare: prendersi cura degli animali, coltivare i campi con il trattore o vendere prodotti artigianali nella bottega. - Occupati di mucche, pecore, asini, maiali da tartufo, pesci, api, polli, anatre e oche. - Divertiti con le tantissime attività di una vera fattoria grazie ai minigiochi: coltiva campi, raccogli frutta, verdura, legna, uova, tartufi e miele, mungi le mucche, tosa le pecore e molto altro ancora. - Gestisci la tua bottega: impara oltre 100 ricette e produci crostate di mele, pane, formaggio e altri prodotti da vendere. - Guida il trattore inclinando il Nintendo 3DS™ e usando gli incredibili comandi del sensore di rotazione. - Supporta i controlli di Circle Pad del tuo Nintendo 3DS™. - Funzionalità foto 3D: scattati una foto 3D e usala nel gioco. - Raccogli monete di gioco e scambiale con valuta virtuale.

Life on a farm is a lot of fun, as there always is something exciting to do: Care for your animals, cultivate your fields with the tractor or sell self-made products in your own farmshop. - Care for cows, sheep, donkeys, truffle pigs, fish, bees, chickens, ducks and geese - Enjoy loads of real farm activities in funny minigames: cultivate fields, harvest vegetables and fruit, collect wood, eggs, truffles and honey, milk the cows, shear the sheep and much more - Manage your own farm shop: Learn over 100 recipes and produce apple pie, bread, cheese and more for selling - Drive the tractor by tilting your Nintendo 3DS™ using the amazing gyroscope controls - Supports Circle Pad controls of your Nintendo 3DS™ - 3D photo feature: Take a real 3D photo of yourself and use it in the game - Collect Play Coins and exchange them for in-game currency

ZA.description: Your life on a farm – live it now in fantastic 3D! Life on a farm is a lot of fun, as there always is something exciting to do: Care for your animals, cultivate your fields with the tractor or sell self-made products in your own farmshop. - Care for cows, sheep, donkeys, truffle pigs, fish, bees, chickens, ducks and geese - Enjoy loads of real farm activities in funny minigames: cultivate fields, harvest vegetables and fruit, collect wood, eggs, truffles and honey, milk the cows, shear the sheep and much more - Manage your own farm shop: Learn over 100 recipes and produce apple pie, bread, cheese and more for selling - Drive the tractor by tilting your Nintendo 3DS™ using the amazing gyroscope controls - Supports Circle Pad controls of your Nintendo 3DS™ - 3D photo feature: Take a real 3D photo of yourself and use it in the game - Collect Play Coins and exchange them for in-game currency
